notes: Use DSGV Sparkassen locator/list to enumerate individual Sparkassen.
Use CECA member entities to enumerate cajas/savings institutions.
Use FNCE/Caisse d’Epargne regional banks to enumerate entities.
Use SpareBank association lists to enumerate member savings banks.
Use s Gruppe / Sparkassen Austria member institutions.
Use Savings Banks Group structure/member banks.
Use ACRI and group structures for savings-bank entities.
Start with CGD + Montepio + member associations for expansions.
